dialogue.name: DWARFMASTER03671
dialogue.text: Lali-yet another recording device has arrived-ho. Whatever Konogg's up to, as long as he keeps sending these, we can assume he's safe and well. Anyway, here you go.

dialogue.name: VILLAGERD03954
dialogue.text: Um, Chief? Can I speak with you for a moment?

dialogue.name: VILLAGERD03954
dialogue.text: It's Glagg. I ran into him just now, and he was behaving oddly...

dialogue.name: VILLAGERD03954
dialogue.text: Just when you think he's angry, he suddenly bursts into tears. And the next thing you know, he's talking with you like you're an old friend.

dialogue.name: DWARFMASTER03671
dialogue.text: Ah, that... He's been that way since the meeting.

dialogue.name: DWARFMASTER03671
dialogue.text: But I'll sort him out, so don't worry. Thanks for bringing me word, and let me know if you notice anything else.

dialogue.name: DWARFMASTER03671
dialogue.text: It seems Glagg's condition isn't common knowledge yet. But it's only a matter of time if it continues to worsen, like it seems to be doing.

dialogue.name: DWARFMASTER03671
dialogue.text: Sorry, I'm saying all of this out loud, but it's not your problem to deal with. Just stay focused on the rebuildingâ”€that's how you'll best help us.

dialogue.name: SYSTEM
dialogue.text: You obtain a message from Konogg.

dialogue.name: SYSTEM
dialogue.text: The message can be viewed in your Portable Archive, which is available under Collection in the Duty section of the main menu.

obj.n: All's Well That Ends with Ale
